column14: I have used many shampoos over the years and while there have been some that I disliked intensely, most have fallen into the "it does its job" camp.  This one by Nexxus does its job.  My hair feels clean and fairly soft after shampooing.  The best thing about this shampoo, however, is the fragrance.  It smells so good!!  Unfortunately, the price is pretty steep for a shampoo whose best feature is its fragrance although the bottle is good sized and lasted for quite awhile.  It's definitely a luxury buy and I'm not sure if I'll go for it again unless it's on sale.
